813:13: ṛṣividadā deva-nāga-yakṣa-rākṣasa-śakra-brahma-lokapāla-viṣṇu-maheśvara-nārāyaṇa-skanda kuberāsurendra-mātṛgaṇa namaskṛtaṃ vajrakṣuramahīyaṃ hayagrīvabrahma paramahṛdayamāvartayiṣyāmi |
813:15: amoghaṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ viṣāṇāñca vināyanam | tad yathā
813:16: om tarula tarula vitarula vitarula sarvaviṣaghātaka sarvabhūtavidrāvaka jvalitānalavisphuliṅgāṭṭahāsa kesarātopāpravitakāya vajrakṣuranirgatita calitavasudhātala bajrodaśvasata hāsita-marutakṣatipraśamanakara paraduṣṭavighnān saṃbhakṣaṇakara svavidyopadeśakara paramaśāntikara buddha buddha bodhayāmiti |
813:20: sidhya sidhya sarvakarmasu me siddhe dehi dehi |
813:21: āveśa āveśa praveśa praveśa sarvagraheṣu apratihata |
813:22: dhuna dhuna vidhuna vidhuna matha matha pramatha pramatha sarvavaropagrama |
813:28: nityāparaprekṣaṇa trāsaya trāsaya mahābodhisattva ṛddhadaṃṣṭraṇena sarvabhayebhyaḥ sattvānāṃ rakṣa rakṣa |
813:29: mama buddhadharmasaṃghānujñātaṃ me karma śīghraṃ kuru kuru phaṭ |
813:38: ye kecit mama ahiteṣiṇaḥ kāye kramanti mantrayaṇa yamanti juhvānati kākhordaṃ kurvanti |
813:40: namaḥ sarvaduṣṭagrahotsādanāya hayagrīvāya sidhyantu mantrapadaiḥ svāhā |
813:41: om amitodbhavāya huṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā |
